text: Susan Bernard (February 11, 1948 – June 21, 2019) was an American author, actress, model and businesswoman. She was born in Los Angeles, California. She was the daughter of photographer Bruno Bernard. Bernard was known for her role as Linda in Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill! (1965) and for being a Playboy model. Bernard died on June 21, 2019 in Los Angeles from a heart attack at the age of 71.Susan Bernard Dies: ‘Faster, Pussycat! Kill!
